document.full_text: malaysia could soon join a growing list of asia-pacific countries, including china, indonesia, mongolia, vietnam, and cambodia, that in the last decade have introduced a form of minimum wage.
document.title: asia-pacific governments play catch-up on minimum wages
lines_and_colors: malaysia could soon join a growing list of asia-pacific countries, including china, indonesia, mongolia, vietnam, and cambodia, that in the last decade have introduced a form of minimum wage.
